tr.td: Amlodipine (as amlodipine besylate) 2.5 mg oral tablet
1 tablet (2.5 mg) by mouth once daily
1 tablet (25 mg) by mouth once daily
1 tablet (10 mg) by mouth once daily
Albuterol (as albuterol sulfate) 830 microgram/mL solution for inhalation
2.5 mg (3 mL of 830 microgram/mL solution) via nebulizer every 4 to 6 hours as needed
120 ACTUAT fluticasone propionate 0.044 MG/ACTUAT Metered Dose Inhaler [Flovent]
Influenza virus antigen only vaccine product
Hepatitis A virus antigen only vaccine product
Clostridium tetani toxoid antigen adsorbed only vaccine product

ul.li: Achieve and maintain blood pressure below 130/80 mmHg through lifestyle modifications.
Patient will demonstrate understanding of hypertension and recommended lifestyle changes (diet, exercise, sodium reduction, weight management, alcohol moderation) within 3 months.
Patient will maintain peak expiratory flow at or above 80% of personal best through adherence to asthma self-management plan.
Patient will have no more than 2 uses of rescue inhaler per week.
Patient will experience daytime asthma symptoms no more than 2 days per week.

tr.td: Pain severity - 0-10 verbal numeric rating [Score] - Reported
Cholesterol in LDL [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Direct assay
Cholesterol in HDL [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
